entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 08:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
